00025 #ifndef __ParticleAffectorFactory_H__
00026 #define __ParticleAffectorFactory_H__
00027 
00028 
00029 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00030 #include "OgreParticleAffector.h"
00031 #include "OgreString.h"
00032 
00033 namespace Ogre {
00034 
00046     class _OgreExport ParticleAffectorFactory
00047     {
00048     protected:
00049         std::vector<ParticleAffector*> mAffectors;
00050     public:
00051         ParticleAffectorFactory() {};
00052         virtual ~ParticleAffectorFactory() 
00053         {
00054             // Destroy all affectors
00055             std::vector<ParticleAffector*>::iterator i;
00056             for (i = mAffectors.begin(); i != mAffectors.end(); ++i)
00057             {
00058                 delete (*i);
00059             }
00060             
00061             mAffectors.clear();
00062 
00063         };
00064 
00066         virtual String getName() = 0;
00067 
00072         virtual ParticleAffector* createAffector(void) = 0;
00073 
00075         virtual void destroyAffector(ParticleAffector* e)
00076         {
00077             std::vector<ParticleAffector*>::iterator i;
00078             for (i = mAffectors.begin(); i != mAffectors.end(); ++i)
00079             {
00080                 if ((*i) == e)
00081                 {
00082                     mAffectors.erase(i);
00083                     delete e;
00084                 }
00085             }
00086         }
00087 
00088     };
00089 
00090 
00091 }
00092 
00093 
00094 #endif
